level.heading: VENDING LOCATIONS[COLON] OLD GEORGETOWN VENDING ZONE (ยง 24-527)

level.text: Except as specifically provided in ยง 527.2, no vendor shall vend on any sidewalk on public space within the area known as Old Georgetown enclosed by the following continuous boundary:
Bounded on the east by Rock Creek and Potomac Parkway from the Potomac River to the north boundary of Dumbarton Oaks Park;

Bounded on the north by the north boundary of Dumbarton Oaks Park, Whitehaven Street, NW, and Whitehaven Parkway, NW, to 35th Street, NW, south along the middle of 35th Street, NW, to Reservoir Road, NW, west along the middle of Reservoir Road, NW, to Glover-Archbold Park;
Bounded on the west by Glover-Archbold Park from Reservoir Road, NW, to the Potomac River; and
Bounded on the south by the Potomac River and the Rock Creek and Potomac Parkway.

The streets listed in this subsection shall constitute the Old Georgetown Vending Zone within which the DDOT Director may approve sidewalk Vending Locations; provided, that sidewalk Vending Locations shall be allowed only:
Within fifty feet (50 ft.) of the intersections of the cross streets with Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
On the sidewalks designated in paragraph (d);
In the directions from Wisconsin Avenue, NW, designated in paragraph (d), unless they are sites or markets authorized by the creation of a Vending Development Zone; and
At the following locations:
Northern sidewalk of P Street, NW, east of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Northern sidewalk of P Street, NW, west of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Northern sidewalk of O Street, NW, east of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Northern sidewalk of O Street, NW, west of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Northern sidewalk of Dumbarton Street, NW, east of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Southern sidewalk of Dumbarton Street, NW, east of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Northern sidewalk of N Street, NW, west of Wisconsin Avenue, NW (two (2) Vending Locations);
Southern sidewalk of N Street, NW, west of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
Southern sidewalk of N Street, NW, east of Wisconsin Avenue, NW;
(10) Northern sidewalk of Prospect Street, NW, west of Wisconsin Avenue, NW; and
(11) Southern sidewalk of Prospect Street, NW, west of Wisconsin Avenue, NW.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 6846, 6849 (September 29, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 13055 (September 20, 2013).
